title: What happens when you fail a 97% chance of success twice?
body:
You realize you're playing XCOM.

Just got this game today on Xbox Games with Gold, and I had this happen in an early mission. Both of my soldiers were almost point blank with the alien in question. Both had 97% chance to hit (and kill). Both missed.

The odds of this happening are 0.09%, just under 1/1000.

No wonder XCOM was harped on for RNG being bullshit.
